comments: Enjoyed this class immensely and enjoyed the open atmosphere. Mr. Alexander was very clear and concise on his assignments and encouraged his students to achieve their greatest potential. Great teacher.

Charles is a very laid back teacher. His main focus/expertise is poetry, so expect it! Show up, participate and roll with it. He\'s very fair and pretty easy but he does know what he\'s doing. If you like a creative writing for 101/102 then take him. He comes up with some really interesting in-class things.

this was supposed to be an honors wrt101 class, and it was more like a creative writing class. i didn\'t learn to write college level papers, but we did some interesting poetry stuff, when we weren\'t going to plays or watching art films. take this class if you need an easy A. if you want to learn something about writing, look elsewhere...
